page.title: 20Employment
page.content: Class One conducted a survey into the employment of their parents. The survey showed the importance of Drax Power Station to the village. Of 33 children; 6 had parents involved in constructing Drax B Power Station 14 had parents working in the Power Station 7 had parents working in industries dependent on the Power Station such as Exel the greenhouse complex that produces tomatoes, lettuce etc. using hot water from the Power Station cooling towers as a heat source 6 had parents working in areas unrelated to the Power Station.
